EVENT.texto: Hello, Weirdy

It's clear

I can see through your eyes and speak to your mind
With that I will be able to help you
So do me a favor
Inspect the <color=orange>elevator</color> or the <color=orange>technician</color> that is there
Hmmm, interesting
Come, I have something for you
Well, here's the point
I sense something strange from the basment
Something that is not ok
And you'll need to <color=orange>hack that elevator</color>

Weird, huh?

Telepathy
Well, a little of. Very basic
I hope you can grow on it soon
